frame_eqs_str: (function(){a['dec_med']=(1-div((0.2*30),a['fps'])); a['dec_slow']=(1-div((0.05*30),a['fps'])); a['beat']=Math.max(Math.max(a['bass'], a['mid']), a['treb']); a['avg']=((a['avg']*a['dec_slow'])+(a['beat']*(1-a['dec_slow']))); a['is_beat']=(above(a['beat'], ((0.2*a['avg'])+a['peak']))*above(a['time'], (a['t0']+0.1))); a['t0']=((a['is_beat']*a['time'])+((1-a['is_beat'])*a['t0'])); a['peak']=((a['is_beat']*a['beat'])+(((1-a['is_beat'])*a['peak'])*a['dec_med'])); a['index']=mod((a['index']+a['is_beat']),16); a['q27']=a['index']; a['q22']=a['peak']; a['peak_']=((a['dec_med']*a['peak_'])+((1-a['dec_med'])*a['peak'])); a['trig']=(a['is_beat']*bnot(mod(a['index'],4))); a['count']=(a['count']+a['trig']); a['rott']=((a['rott']*a['dec_med'])+div((((1-a['dec_med'])*a['count'])*3.14),2)); a['q1']=Math.cos(a['rott']); a['q2']=Math.sin(a['rott']); a['ma']=(a['ma']+((div((a['peak_']-0),a['fps'])*4)*above(a['peak_'], 0))); a['mx']=((a['mx']*a['dec_slow'])+((1-a['dec_slow'])*Math.cos(a['ma']))); a['my']=((a['my']*a['dec_slow'])+((1-a['dec_slow'])*Math.sin((a['ma']*a['q1'])))); a['q15']=div(a['mx'],2); a['q16']=div(a['my'],2); a['q17']=a['ma']; a['ang1']=(a['ang1']+(div(((8*a['bass'])*above(a['bass'], 1)),a['fps'])*a['q1'])); a['q18']=a['ang1']; a['q32']=a['aspecty']; a['monitor']=a['q1'];}());
